about_the_game:
Stay Alive is a game with simple gameplay, designed in retro pixel art style, with elements of mythology and roguelite.

Sometimes running away isn't the solution, but sometimes you shouldn't even look back, and giving up isn't always the end.
What will you do? Do you trust your decisions, can your choices keep you alive?
Try to survive against hundreds of enemies whose origins are unknown. They only want one thing. To. Destroy. You.

  • Fast runs (Max. 30 min).
  • Over 50 achievements.
  • Over 15 characters and weapons.
  • Upgrade your weapons, passives and characters.
  • Evolve your weapons and cause even more chaos.
  • Fight against powerful bosses that have random skills.
  • Refundable upgrades for casual gamers.

Stay Alive is a roguelite survival game inspired by Vampire Survivors and Path of Exile.
